attributes.action: to immediately reverse the home office decision in relation to the Gurkhas and to immediately allow all Gurkas and their families to live in the UK with full rights and access to all services and benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These men and their families have given so much for us, They have shown themselves to be a credit to this country and if we do not allow them to be here it is the UK that will lose

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
